title: Buy fresh vegetables
description: Pick up tomatoes, spinach, and bell peppers from the local market.

title: Get dairy products
description: Milk, yogurt, and cheddar cheese are on the list.

title: Restock fruits
description: Bananas, oranges, and apples are running low.

title: Purchase meat
description: Chicken breasts and ground beef are needed for the week's meals.

title: Seafood section
description: Shrimps and salmon fillets are on sale, grab some.

title: Cereal & breakfast
description: Oats and cereal boxes are almost finished. Also, consider getting honey.

title: Snacks and crisps
description: Stock up on some potato chips and pretzels for movie night.

title: Beverages
description: Juices for the kids and maybe some soda.

title: Bakery items
description: Fresh bread for sandwiches and some croissants for breakfast.

title: Frozen section
description: Frozen peas, corn, and some ice cream for dessert.
